title: Review Closing Settlement Statement
description: Prior to closing, the agent must review the settlement statement (Closing Disclosure or HUD-1) for accuracy.

tasks.description: Receive the draft settlement statement from the escrow or title company.
Verify key financial figures: sales price, commission amount, seller concessions, and prorated taxes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent cross-references the statement with the purchase agreement and identifies all figures are correct.

tasks.description: Approve the statement or send a list of required corrections back to the escrow officer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the statement is accurate and notifies escrow to proceed.
